verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2063>These<s%> are the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> among <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6536>parteth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is <S%H8156>cloven-footed,<s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> and <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> among the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> that shall ye <S%H398>eat.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of them that <S%H4480>chew<s%> <S%H5927><s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> or of them that <S%H4480>divide<s%> <S%H6536><s%> the <S%H6541>hoof:<s%> <S%H853>as<s%> the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divideth<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

And the <S%H8227>coney,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divideth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

And the <S%H768>hare,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> but <S%H6536>divideth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

And the <S%H2386>swine,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6536>divide<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and be <S%H8156>cloven-footed,<s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H6541><s%> yet <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1641>cheweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1625>cud;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

Of their <S%H4480>flesh<s%> <S%H1320><s%> shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5060>touch;<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you.

<S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>These<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> hath <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> them shall ye <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> and <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and in the <S%H5158>rivers,<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H8318>move<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and of <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto you:

They shall <S%H1961>be<s%> even an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto you; ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of their <S%H4480>flesh,<s%> <S%H1320><s%> but ye shall have their carcasses in <S%H8262>abomination.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5038><s%>
Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5579>fins<s%> nor <S%H7193>scales<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto you.

And <S%H428>these<s%> are they which ye shall have in <S%H8262>abomination<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H5775>fowls;<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are an <S%H8263>abomination:<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and the <S%H6538>ossifrage,<s%> and the <S%H5822>osprey,<s%>
And the <S%H1676>vulture,<s%> and the <S%H344>kite<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind;<s%>
<S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H6158>raven<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind;<s%>
And the <S%H1323>owl,<s%> <S%H3284><s%> and the night <S%H8464>hawk,<s%> and the <S%H7828>cuckoo,<s%> and the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And the little <S%H3563>owl,<s%> and the <S%H7994>cormorant,<s%> and the great <S%H3244>owl,<s%>
And the <S%H8580>swan,<s%> and the <S%H6893>pelican,<s%> and the <S%H7360>gier-eagle,<s%>
And the <S%H2624>stork,<s%> the <S%H601>heron<s%> after her <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H1744>lapwing,<s%> and the <S%H5847>bat.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> that <S%H8318>creep,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> all <S%H702>four,<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto you.

Yet <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> may ye <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5775>flying<s%> creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> all <S%H702>four,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3767>legs<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> to <S%H5425>leap<s%> <S%H2004>withal<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

Even <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them ye may <S%H398>eat;<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H697>locust<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the bald <S%H5556>locust<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H2728>beetle<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%> and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind.<s%>
But <S%H3605>all<s%> other <S%H5775>flying<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet,<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination<s%> unto you.

And for <S%H428>these<s%> ye shall be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H5375>beareth<s%> aught of the <S%H4480>carcass<s%> <S%H5038><s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

The carcasses of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6536>divideth<s%> the <S%H6541>hoof,<s%> and is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8156>cloven-footed,<s%> <S%H8157><s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H5927>cheweth<s%> the <S%H1625>cud,<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you: every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> them shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3709>paws,<s%> among all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H2416>beasts<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> all <S%H702>four,<s%> <S%H1992>those<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you: <S%H3605>whoso<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

These <S%H2088><s%> also shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you among the creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> the <S%H2467>weasel,<s%> and the <S%H5909>mouse,<s%> and the <S%H6632>tortoise<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind,<s%>
And the <S%H604>ferret,<s%> and the <S%H3581>chameleon,<s%> and the <S%H3911>lizard,<s%> and the <S%H2546>snail,<s%> and the <S%H8580>mole.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are <S%H2931>unclean<s%> to you among <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8318>creep:<s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> doth <S%H5060>touch<s%> them, when they be <S%H4194>dead,<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> any <S%H4480>of<s%> them, when they are <S%H4194>dead,<s%> doth <S%H5307>fall,<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> whether it be <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H899>raiment,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5785>skin,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8242>sack,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> it be, <S%H834>wherein<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> is <S%H6213>done,<s%> it must be <S%H935>put<s%> into <S%H4325>water,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even;<s%> so it shall be <S%H2891>cleansed.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> <S%H834>whereinto<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H8432><s%> any <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H5307>falleth,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> is <S%H8432>in<s%> it shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> and ye shall <S%H7665>break<s%> it.

Of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H400>meat<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> may be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> that <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> such <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4945>drink<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> may be <S%H8354>drunk<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> such <S%H3627>vessel<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> thing <S%H834>whereupon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> any part of their <S%H4480>carcass<s%> <S%H5038><s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean;<s%> whether it be <S%H8574>oven,<s%> or ranges for <S%H3600>pots,<s%> they shall be broken <S%H5422>down:<s%> for <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> or <S%H953>pit,<s%> wherein there is <S%H4723>plenty<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2889>clean:<s%> but that which <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any part <S%H4480>of<s%> their <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2221>sowing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is to be <S%H2232>sown,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H4325>water<s%> be <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and any part of their <S%H4480>carcass<s%> <S%H5038><s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> unto you.

And <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H929>beast,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye may <S%H402>eat,<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And he that <S%H398>eateth<s%> of the <S%H4480>carcass<s%> <S%H5038><s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even:<s%> he also that <S%H5375>beareth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of it shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>even.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be an <S%H8263>abomination;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1512>belly,<s%> and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> all <S%H702>four,<s%> or <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> hath <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> creeping <S%H8318>things<s%> that <S%H8317>creep<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> them ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are an <S%H8263>abomination.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H408>not<s%> make yourselves <S%H8262>abominable<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye make yourselves <S%H2930>unclean<s%> with them, that ye should be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> thereby.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> ye shall therefore sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves,<s%> and ye shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6918>holy:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> with any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of creeping <S%H8318>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that bringeth you <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> ye shall therefore <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and of the <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H7430>moveth<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%> that <S%H8317>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

To make a <S%H914>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2416>beast<s%> that may be <S%H398>eaten<s%> and the <S%H2416>beast<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> may <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
